data.name: UsernameExists.Text
data.value:
Registration Failed! Username {0} is already registered.
Please select a different Username.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About the User Management Module

Administrators can manage their registered users. This module allows you to add new users, modify existing users, delete users, and manage the security roles for users.

data.name: UserLockedOut.Text
data.value: This account is currently locked out due to too many unsuccessful login attempts.

data.name: InvalidUser.Text
data.value: This account is not a User in the current Portal.

data.name: SuperUser.Text
data.value: This account represents a SuperUser. You do not have the rights to edit a SuperUser Account.

data.name: plNewConfirm.Help
data.value: Re-Enter the new password to make sure you haven't made a typing mistake

data.name: NewPassword.Text
data.value: You must enter a new password.

data.name: PasswordResetFailed.Text
data.value: There was an error setting the password. The password has not been changed.

data.name: PasswordQAChanged.Text
data.value: Password Question and Answer successfully updated.

data.name: NotAuthorized.Text
data.value: You are not authorized to edit this user.

data.name: PrivateMembership.Text
data.value: *Note: Membership to this portal is Private. Once your account information has been submitted, the portal Administrator will be notified and your application will be subjected to a screening procedure. If your application is authorized, you will receive notification of your access to the portal environment.

data.name: PublicMembership.Text
data.value: *Note: Membership to this portal is Public. Once your account information has been submitted, you will be immediately granted access to the portal environment.

data.name: VerifiedMembership.Text
data.value: *Note: Membership to this portal is Verified. Once your account information has been submitted, you will receive an email containing your unique Verification Code. The Verification Code will be required the first time you attempt to sign in to the portal environment.

data.name: Required.Text
data.value: All fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.

data.name: VerifiedConfirmationMessage.Text
data.value:
An e-mail with your verification code has been sent to your e-mail address: {0}
Please access your in-box and get the verification code, which is required to log-in first time.

data.name: PrivateConfirmationMessage.Text
data.value: An e-mail with your details has been sent to the portal administrator for verification. Once your registration has been approved an e-mail will be sent to your e-mail address: {0}.

data.name: PasswordInvalid.Text
data.value: You must enter a valid password. Please check with the Portal Administrator if you do not know the password requirements.

data.name: PasswordMismatch.Text
data.value: Password Values Entered Do Not Match.

data.name: PasswordMissing.Text
data.value: You must provide your current password in order to change the password.

data.name: PasswordNotDifferent.Text
data.value: The new password is the same as the old password. Please enter a different password
